summary: The Dallas Cowboys are a popular NFL football team based in Texas. They have a long history, joining the league in 1960, and have appeared in the Super Bowl eight times. The team has a huge fan base and holds the record for the most consecutive sold-out games. The Cowboys are known for their success, with 20 straight winning seasons. They are also one of the most valuable sports teams globally, worth over $5 billion. Mike McCarthy is the current head coach.
title: Dallas Cowboys
